mapper.select: select post_id, b.id, post_date, contents, cnt_like, cnt_reply, rank, nickname, address1 from Board b join UserAdditional u on b.id=u.id join Rank r on b.id = r.id order by post_date desc;
mapper.insert: insert into Board(id, contents, cnt_like, cnt_reply) values(#{id}, #{contents}, #{cnt_like}, #{cnt_reply});
